title: State Department to deny visas to fact checkers and others, citing 'censorship'
description: The order is focused on applicants for H-1B visas, which are frequently used by tech companies and is part of a campaign by the Trump administration against online content moderation.
content: The State Department is instructing its staff to reject visa applications from people who worked on fact-checking, content moderation or other activities the Trump administration considers "censorshi… [+4407 chars]
